程序包 fchen

类 MetaProofData

  • java.lang.Object
    • fchen.MetaProofData

  • public class MetaProofData
extends java.lang.Object
    This class encapsulates the tuple (index, filename, state, authentication path) and some corresponding methods. It is used in two cases. One case is to use this class as the leaf level data for building the hash authentication tree. In this case, the field 'authenticationPath' is not used. Another case is to use it as a part of the search result. Now the field 'authenticationPath' is used. The cloud could return a few of such tuples because of the hash collisions.
    作者:
    Chen, Fei (https://sites.google.com/site/chenfeiorange/), last revision on 15-01-2020, Email: chenfeiorange@163.com

    • 方法详细资料

      • generateHash

        public byte[] generateHash​()

      • validate

        public boolean validate​(byte[] root)
        This function check whether an authentication path is legal. A legal path has two properties: one is that the leaf node value is equal to hash(index, filename); the other is that the authentication path is correct.
        参数:
        root - - the root value of the hash authentication tree
        返回:
        true/false

      • print

        public void print​()
        This function prints out the proof data object.
